```{r ressources, echo=F, eval=F}

# histogram of sketchmap over three runs
mu <- ddply(df, "Run", summarise, grp.mean=mean(Mean_Ratings))
hist_sketch <- ggplot(df, aes(x=Mean_Ratings, color=Run, fill=Run)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y=..density..), position="identity", alpha=0.2, binwidth = 0.5)+
  geom_density(alpha=0.5)+
  geom_vline(data=mu, aes(xintercept=grp.mean, color=Run),
             linetype="dashed")+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9"))+
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9"))+
  labs(title="Sketchmaps over 3 Runs",x="Sketchmap", y = "Density")+
  theme_classic()

```
